proposals.description: Establish a Feedback Loop Optimization mechanism to measure and improve the quality of inter-agent communication. Currently, agents may generate outputs that are suboptimal for downstream agents, creating inefficiencies in the improvement pipeline.
proposals.implementation_sketch: Implement quality metrics for each agent's outputs (proposal clarity, code correctness, test coverage, etc.) and create a feedback mechanism where downstream agents can provide structured feedback to upstream agents. Include a dharmic communication standard that emphasizes clarity, honesty, and constructive collaboration.
